title: my leauge client wont let me log in. keep getting a error code 003 every time i go to open lol up
body: why wont it let me log into my lol nothing was working so im trying to re install now and it wont even download anything? does anyone know what is happening?

replies.body:
It seems like the server was indeed having issues around this time; however, the issue also seems to now be resolved.
